snippet: The United States players in an international friendly soccer match in Cyprus were hoping to earn a ticket to the World Cup. The Ukrainian team had much more on its mind.
abstract: Ukraine defeats the United States national soccer team, 2-0, in exhibition match that brimmed with symbolism for the citizens of the crisis-ridden nation; Ukrainian players lock arms during their national anthem, amid shouts of 'Ukraine is one' from fans.
lead_paragraph: The United States players in an international friendly soccer match in Cyprus were hoping to earn a ticket to the World Cup. The Ukrainian team had much more on its mind.

headline.main: Ukraine Defeats United States in an Exhibition With Deeper Meaning
headline.print_headline: An Exhibition Game Overflows With Meaning

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
